0101001010000011 1110101011110011 0 -> sum: 0011110101110110, cout: 1
1000010110010001 1100000110001101 0 -> sum: 0100011100011110, cout: 1
0011001010010010 1000001011001100 1 -> sum: 1011010101011111, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
